customer_name: N B J Zoological Park Ltd
site_name: N B J Zoological Park Ltd

citations.narrative:
An electric cord for a heater is within reach of the gibbon pair with the infant. There is danger of severe injury or
death if the animals reach the cord. All electric cords near enclosures for non human primates must be made
inaccessible to the animals to protect them from injury . CORRECT BY : IMMEDIATELY
This focused inspection of non compliant items from inspection of 10/18/16 and exit briefing was conducted with a
facility employee.

narrative:
3.75(a)
HOUSING FACILITIES, GENERAL. 
An electric cord for a heater is within reach of the gibbon pair with the infant. There is danger of severe injury or
death if the animals reach the cord. All electric cords near enclosures for non human primates must be made
inaccessible to the animals to protect them from injury .  CORRECT BY : IMMEDIATELY
This focused inspection of non compliant items from inspection of 10/18/16 and exit briefing was conducted with a
facility employee.
